data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Shanis, Rajool (2011): A new species of the genus Parastylodactylus Figueira, 1971 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea: Stylodactylidae) from off Kollam, southwest coast of India. Zootaxa 3140: 60-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204482
